p.sent: An Indian has won AED 7 million (f12.7 crore) in a rafﬂe in the UAE, media reports said on Thursday.
Anil Varghese Theveril, 50, who works in Kuwait as an executive assistant, said he hit the jackpot on the ticket number that matched with his son’s date of birth, Khaleej Times reported.
He was declared the top winner in the Big Ticket millionaire draw held at the Abu Dhabi Internation- al Airport.
The eight winners of the jackpot include six Indians, each of whom won AED 1 million ($1.8 crore).
A Bangladesh and a Moroccan were also among the winners.
Varghese has been working in Kuwait for the last 20 years.
“I purchased the ticket online and chose; the number 11197 because of my son’s date of birth is 11/97,” he said.
“I am trying my luck with Big Ticket for the second time.
The reality is still to sink in,” he said.
Varghese’s son is pursuing an undergraduate course in Kerala.
